editorialNotes.standard: With exciting events, famous characters, and wild courses, Nintendo's legendary kart-racing series burns rubber on mobile.
editorialNotes.short: Tour the world and race on tracks in cities around the globe.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: CSR knows how to supercharge a sequel. Drag-racing is as fun as ever - and you won’t believe how good it all looks. And now you can squash other players in Live Races, which is about as fun as it gets.
editorialNotes.short: Hit top speed and don't look back.

editorialNotes.standard: A glistening stretch of rain-soaked pavement lies before you. Will you drift, draft or smash your way to victory? Whatever your style, this iconic street racer delivers hugely fun arcade action. Impressive graphics make every Subaru, Porsche and McLaren a sight to behold, and a vast lineup of events gives you plenty of ways to show opponents your taillights. Individual races are enjoyably brief, and we got swept up in blazing through them to unlock the most exotic cars and discover the next challenges.

name: Traffic Rider
artistName: Skgames Yazilim Muhendislik Teknoloji Ltd. Sti.

editorialNotes.short: Are you ready to rule the roads with your motorbike?

editorialNotes.standard: We’re blown away by the newest installment of EA’s popular racing franchise. We found ourselves gawking at reflections, lens flare, and scenery as we motored through hairpin turns at breakneck speeds. The improvements aren't just cosmetic, though—you'll find yourself stunned by the believable roars of engines and the huge variety of true-to-life cars and courses. RR3 also packs great new gameplay features like Time Shifted Multiplayer, which allows us to race asynchronously against friends in fierce tests of driving prowess.

ios.subtitle: Join the guys in a crazy race!
Race and drive uphill to win!

editorialNotes.standard: We keep racing back to this trick-filled biking game, where pulling off awesome moves is just as important as crossing the finish line first.
Barrel through classic Disney locations as Mickey, Elsa, Mulan, Woody, and loads of other iconic characters in this thrilling racer.

ios.subtitle: Drift fast to beat all racers!

editorialNotes.standard: Weather effects. Tilt controls. Deep customization. This feature-rich retro racer left our expectations in the dust.

editorialNotes.tagline: Don't forget to buzz the tower

name: Trial Car Driving - Car Crash
artistName: Ngoc vinh trading service company limited

ios.subtitle: Build your racing car. Go fast

editorialNotes.tagline: Run, climb and swim to win

ios.subtitle: Feel the speed! Own the race!

editorialNotes.standard: We love the chaotic whimsy of cute animals launching lightning strikes and sawblades to seize the lead in this auto-running racer.

name: Car Driving Master: Mega Ramp
artistName: Ngoc vinh trading service company limited

name: Car games: drive car parking
artistName: Akarau: multiplayer games, online games & offline games

editorialNotes.standard: Beat dozens of other eggs to the finish line—or take a crack at creating your own levels—in this game’s ebullient obstacle courses.

Conquer street and sky in Gameloft’s fastest racing game yet, a mix of high-octane driving and incredible jumps that harkens back to the age of San Francisco Rush and classic Burnout. Pairing white-knuckle action with an array of career and online modes, it sets a new standard for arcade racers on the App Store.

name: Highway Overtake - Car Racing
artistName: HYPERMONK GAMES OYUN YAZILIM PAZARLAMA VE DANISMANLIK ANONIM SIRKETI

ios.subtitle: Be ready to overtake on time!
Riding has never been so fun!

editorialNotes.standard: Infiltrating zombie-infested warehouses might not be the easiest way to fix up a taco truck, but it’s definitely the most entertaining.

name: Traffic Driving Car Simulator
